description.value:
A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra 2d6 positive damage to undead. On a critical hit, the undead creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|name:Greater Disrupting] save with the following effects. This is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Success It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn.

Failure It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure It's destroyed.
